results.content: Hiya. Good morning. I am just calling as I've booked taxi on the app, but I see that it still says allocating driver. I'm just wanting to check if everything was alright.
Let me just have a look. I can see a driver has received it. Sorry. Our system takes a little bit of time just to upgrade.

Ah, okay. Let's just have a look. Unfortunately, it looks like that driver didn't take it. So let's go and see what's happening. Sorry. The system's now reallocating somebody. Alright. Can I give you a callback in just one second just to let the system sort itself out?
And then I can give you a proper ETA.
That would be perfect. Thank you so much.
